# KPZ-AI-Scrum-Master
An application that supports the work of a Scrum Master, utilizing artificial intelligence tools.

## Authors
- Maciej Padula
- Filip Murawski
- ≈Åukasz Gawron

## Tech Stack
- Backend
  - NX
  - ASP.NET Core 8.0 Web API
  - Dapper
  - Microsoft SQL Server

- Frontend
  - Angular
  - TypeScript
  - Angular Material UI
  - Tailwind CSS

- ![Chat GPT](data:image/png;base64,) Chat GPT
- ![Taiga.io](data:image/png;base64,) Taiga.io
